question: A real estate appraisal is defined as:

options.value: A guarantee of what the property will sell for

remediation: A real estate Appraisal is an opinion of the market value of a property.

question: What makes properties go up in value when inventory is low?

options.value: The Law of Supply and Demand

remediation: The Law of Supply and Demand causes properties to go up in value when inventory is low and go down in value when supply is high.
